text.autoconfig.fst.title: Fire's Survival Tweaks Config
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableBlazePo: Blaze Powder works like Bone Meal when used on Nether Wart.
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableInfeste: Silverfish Infested Blocks will break at the same speed as the original block.
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableCaveins: More destruction at once = higher chance.
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableFalling: Blocks that should fall will when the player is near.
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableSlimeTo: Slimes absorb Magma to turn into Magma Cubes.
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableMagmaCu: Magma Cubes absorb Magma to grow.
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableSlimeGr: Slimes absorb Slime and Honey Blocks to grow.
text.autoconfig.fst.option.enableMagmaCu: Magma Cubes cool to Slime when wet.
